attributes.action: RESTORE THE POST OFFICE TO ITS POSITION AS A PUBLIC SERVICE WITH PROPER INDEPENDENT POST OFFICES NOT COUNTERS IN NATIONAL CHAIN STORES  AND PROVIDING A 7 DAYS A WEEK COLLECTION SERVICE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Post Office is a symbol of a civilised society. By making it compete against other delivery services it is being destroyed. Sunday collections are being abolished again and many towns no longer have proper post offices as the service has been transferred to a counter inside W.H. Smith or similar retail unit. We oppose this destruction of a public service and request that the Post Office be properly funded so that it can provide a proper public .service

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
